para.text: "Ratio config" defined the ratios used for Low Level output and IEC61850 modes.
Low Level output modes effective only Group1 and Group2, IEC61850 mode can effective all groups.
Primary and Secondary columns defined the ratios for IEC61850 modes.
Reference(9-2) and Sample(9-2) columns defined the resolution for IEC61850-9-2 mode.
Input(llv) and Output(llv) columns defined the ratio for Low-Level output mode.
